name: Arc'teryx Momenta Dress - Women's
description:
It looks good at the office, and looks even better out and about. The Momenta Dress has the  comfort of a T-shirt yet ticks the boxes for dinner plans and dress codes.Breathable DryTech™ Stretch blend has just the right amount of stretch.Sleeves provide a little extra coverage.Considered patterning and raglan sleeves create a trim, tailored silhouette.Mesh lining helps wick moisture and gives the dress a natural drape.Mesh lined hand pockets add airflow.

        Sustainability
